name: react-native-fc
heading: React-Native-FusionCharts
subHeading: An easy-to-use, lightweight React Native component for the FusionCharts JavaScript Charting Library
about: The React-Native-FusionCharts component provides bindings for FusionCharts JavaScript Charting Library. It easily adds rich and interactive charts to any React Native Projects.
features: Adds a chart using just one single React Native component.
Keeps the chart reactive when the chart configs change.
Allows you to enable interactivity between Javascript charts.
Supports all chart configs as currently supported in FusionCharts.
Offers advanced control by giving you access to the FusionCharts object.
